# Video Files

The video files for this project are too large for GitHub (>100MB).

Please ensure the following video files are placed in this directory:
- `banner.mp4` (114 MB)
- `footer2.mp4`
- `footer3.mp4`
- `readytoplay.mp4`
- `spinwheel.mp4` (50 MB)

These videos should be hosted externally or obtained from the project owner.
